## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrangesmap">AddressRangesMap</a> class maps values to the address ranges.

It keeps normalized address ranges and corresponding values. This class keeps a sorted vector of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrangevaluepair">AddressRangeValuePair</a> objects and can perform insertions and searches efficiently. Intersecting(&#91;100,200), &#91;150,300)) ranges splitted into non-conflicting parts(&#91;100,200), &#91;200,300)). Adjacent(&#91;100,200), &#91;200,300)) address ranges are not combined during insertion.

Definition at line 165 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/addressranges-h">AddressRanges.h</a>.
